title: Garlic Lime Chicken-in slow-cooker -recipe
directions: Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. Pour over chicken.
Cover. Cook on Low 4 hours, or until instant-read thermometer registers 160°–165° when stuck in thighs, but not against bone.
ingredients: ⅓-¼ cup lime juice, according to your taste preference
2 garlic cloves or 1 tsp. garlic powder minced
